name: twirpscript-development
description: Protobuf RPC framework for JavaScript and TypeScript
author: Tate Thurston <tatethurston@gmail.com>

scripts.examples:each: for e in $(ls examples | grep -v buf); do (cd ./examples/"$e" && $npm_config_command); done
scripts.examples:regen: npm run examples:buf:regen && npm run examples:each --command='npx twirpscript' && npm run examples:each --command='tsc --noEmit'
scripts.examples:setup: (cd examples/buf && npm install) && npm run examples:each --command='npm install'
scripts.package:build: npm run clean && npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:module && chmod +x dist/compiler.js dist/cli/index.js && cp src/compiler.cmd dist/compiler.cmd && npm run package:prune && npm run package:copy:files
scripts.regen: npm run test:integration && npm run test -- -u && npm run examples:regen
scripts.test-protos: (cd src/integration-tests/protos && npm run build && npm run typecheck:protos)
scripts.test:integration: npm run test-protos && npm run test-clientcompat
